Minichamps 430818521 Ford Capri Turbo 1981 DRM Series Div.II 5th Place

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: https://minichamps.de/EN/Models/ModelDetails/430818521/index.html

Whenever Klaus Niedzwiedz did finish a race in 1981 he usually fiinished in the top 3. 5 DNFs didn't help though so he wound up 5th overall in Division II for the final season of the DRM series.
